## Target Documentation

**Which documentation area needs improvement?**

- [ ] **API Documentation** - XML comments, interface descriptions, usage examples
- [ ] **User Guides** - How-to guides, feature explanations, workflow documentation
- [ ] **Tutorials** - Step-by-step learning materials, getting started guides
- [ ] **Examples** - Code examples, project templates, operator examples
- [ ] **Developer Documentation** - Architecture guides, contribution guidelines, coding standards
- [ ] **Troubleshooting** - Known issues, error messages, problem resolution
- [ ] **Wiki Pages** - Community documentation, FAQs, best practices

### Documentation Location

## Issue Type

**What type of documentation issue is this?**

- [ ] **Missing Documentation** - Important topic not documented anywhere
- [ ] **Outdated Information** - Documentation no longer matches current functionality
- [ ] **Unclear Content** - Information is confusing or hard to understand
- [ ] **Incomplete Content** - Documentation starts but doesn't finish
- [ ] **Broken Examples** - Code examples that don't work as shown
- [ ] **Missing Examples** - Important concepts without practical demonstrations
- [ ] **Bad Organization** - Information is in the wrong place or poorly structured
- [ ] **Typos/Grammar** - Spelling, grammar, or formatting issues

## Priority

**How urgent is this documentation fix?**

- [ ] **Critical** - Blocks users from understanding essential functionality
- [ ] **High** - Important feature or workflow not properly documented
- [ ] **Medium** - Improves user experience and reduces confusion
- [ ] **Low** - Nice-to-have improvement for completeness

## Target Audience

**Who will benefit most from this documentation improvement?**

- [ ] **New Users** - People just getting started with TiXL
- [ ] **Developers** - People contributing code or creating operators
- [ ] **Artists/Creators** - People using TiXL for content creation
- [ ] **Plugin Developers** - People extending TiXL with custom functionality
- [ ] **System Administrators** - People deploying or maintaining TiXL
- [ ] **All Users** - General documentation that helps everyone
